ygData.subject: Re: Location of Runes
ygData.msgSnippet: I got a Rune of Karanas off a Barbed Bone in Unrest..on Cazic-Thule
ygData.messageBody:
I got a Rune of Karanas off a Barbed Bone in Unrest..on Cazic-Thule

Alan Charity wrote:

> From: "Alan Charity" <acharity@...>
>
> I received a Rune of Proximity from a Ghoul in North Ro last night.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Shanna [mailto:shanna@...]
> Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 4:35 PM
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Location of Runes
>
> From: "Shanna" <shanna@...>
>
> Rune of Proximity off a kodiak bear in W. Commons last night.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cristie <cristie@...>
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
> Date: Thursday, May 13, 1999 12:43 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Location of Runes
>
> >From: Cristie <cristie@...>
> >
> >I have heard lots of people getting runes in lavastorm as of late ..
> >especially off the ele's there.. unfortunately when it comes my turn to
> >loot...I seem to come up empty handed :) Go figure. My previous post
> >wasn't meant to just direct to east commons.. I should have followed up
> >with extra information that it wasn't just wisps or that particular
> >area...that was before runes and other research components were made more
> >readily available. It was a surprise to me to get that.
> >Alaia
> >
> >
> >
> >At 12:28 PM 5/13/99 -0400, you wrote:
> >>From: TkAdam@...
> >>
> >>There is no "specific" monster to look for them.
> >>
> >>They are randomly found items. You find them on magical, or magic using
> >>creatures. So you can't say "go to Rathe, and kill Bob the evil mage" You
> >>have to say... "Go to lavastorm, kill elementals. I will trade items I
> can't
> >>use for items you can't use"
> >>
> >>So this mailing list was rally intended to be...
> >>
> >>"I have Rune of zapping, page 550000 of the grimoire. I will trade for
> Word
> >>of smiting, and word of suffering."
> >>
> >>But it is nice to have the conversations about spell research it in
> general
> >>also.
> >>
> >>Sonoroud.
> >>
> >>------------------------------------------------------------------------
> >>How many communities do you think join ONElist each day?
> >>http://www.onelist.com
> >>More than 1,000!
> >>------------------------------------------------------------------------
> >>This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell
> >>research. Please keep the emails on topic.
> >
> >
> >
> >------------------------------------------------------------------------
> >Star Wars fans are using ONElist to share the fun.
> >http://www.ONElist.com
> >Are you?
> >------------------------------------------------------------------------
> >This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell research.
> Please keep the emails on topic.
> >
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> ONElist: where real people with real interests get connected.
> http://www.onelist.com
> Join a new list today!
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell research.
> Please keep the emails on topic.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> ONElist members are using Shared Files in great ways!
> http://www.onelist.com
> Are you? If not, see our homepage for details.
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell research. Please keep the emails on topic.
